name: King of Spin VR
description: Shane Warne King of Spin is a fun, pick up and play batting game for the HTC Vive where you can have a quick hit with your friends, or even simulate a full team in a one-day match innings, facing 50 overs at various difficulty from Shane Warne!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater (DX11 for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: As VR hardware improves and resolutions increase, recommended system requirements will increase as well.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater (DX11 for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: As VR hardware improves and resolutions increase, recommended system requirements will increase as well.
